definition: to spin (cotton or hemp etc)/fine woven silk fabric
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

sentences.english: Marseilles is a chief port and Lyon is an industrial center famous for its textiles.
sentences.chinese: 馬賽是最大的港口，而里昂則以紡織工業著稱於世。

sentences.english: The 19th century saw the textile industry's progress caused by advances in chemistry.
sentences.chinese: 19世紀是以化學進步而引起紡織工業發展爲特點的。

sentences.english: The process of identification and substitution of mutagenic dyes in the textile industry is described in detail.
sentences.chinese: 詳細描述了紡織工業中誘變染料的鑑別和替代過程。

sentences.english: Chemical Fiber and Textile Xinxiang is one of the 39 important domestic bases of textile industry.
sentences.chinese: 化纖紡織全國39個重點紡織工業基地之一。

sentences.english: The fiber from flax is an important raw material of textile industries.
sentences.chinese: 莖稈纖維是紡織工業的重要原料。
